executiveSummary: Venezuelan sisters MAF and Coko pitched their frozen Latin American food brand, Toast-It, on Shark Tank, seeking $100,000 for 5% equity. After presenting their productâ€™s strong retail presence and growth but facing concerns over low margins, they secured a deal with Daniel Lubetzky for $150,000 in exchange for 20% equity.
keyDecisions: Daniel Lubetzky invested $150,000 for 20% equity in Toast-It.

actionItems.task: Optimize production processes with newly acquired machinery to improve margins.
Implement new packaging deal to reduce packaging costs by half.
Collaborate with Daniel Lubetzky to scale distribution and refine business strategy.

nextSteps: MAF and Coko will partner with Daniel Lubetzky to grow Toast-It, enhance production efficiency, and improve margins for sustainable scaling.
